title: Linux lndir Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the lndir command in Linux, learn how to create symbolic links, and manage them effectively. Discover practical examples to enhance your file system management skills.

meta.title: Linux lndir Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the lndir command in Linux, learn how to create symbolic links, and manage them effectively. Discover practical examples to enhance your file system management skills.
meta.keywords: lndir, symbolic links, file system, Linux utilities, disk management, file management

steps.title: Understand the Purpose of lndir Command

verify.name: Verify the creation of symbolic links
verify.hint: Ensure that the `lndir` command was executed correctly and that symbolic links were created in the `~/project/destination` directory.

verify.name: Verify the creation of symbolic links
verify.hint: Ensure that the `lndir` command was executed correctly and that symbolic links were created in the `~/project/destination2` directory.

verify.name: Verify the management of symbolic links
verify.hint: Ensure that the `lndir` command was used to update the symbolic links, and that the symbolic link to `file4.txt` was removed.
